title: [1.6.1][ssp/smp]TreeCapitator——砍树Mod!

txt_content:
本帖最后由 Darkyoooooo 于 2013-7-6 14:25 编辑 

[diamond_gem]喜闻乐见的砍树Mod终于更新了!
具体介绍/配置请看:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=73114&highlight=%BF%B3%CA%F7

[diamond_gem]安装方法:
1.将[1.6.1]TreeCapitator.Forge.1.6.1.r01.Uni.CoreMod.jar拖入coremods文件夹内
2.将[1.6.1]bspkrsCorev3.01.zip拖入mods文件夹内
3.开游戏

[diamond_gem]下载地址:

replies.author: 小鸟游·六花
shxq
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 shxq 于 2013-7-6 12:41 编辑 

TreeCapitator我放到coremods目录里了,但是不起作用.




2013-07-06_12.22.20.png (145.56 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2013-7-6 12:23 上传





没有加载,为什么?

我去官网看到.

#2847
I have installed the most recent version of Forge with the installer v 771, I have downloaded the 1.6.1 versions of both bspkrs(in the mods folder) and treecapitator(in the coremods folder) as instructed but treecapitator never shows up as a mod and I cannot chop down trees with cutting the bottom block. Can anyone instruct me on what I am doing wrong? I have had the same problem since 1.4.7.

#2849 
Used minecraftforge-installer-1.6.1-8.9.0.771.jar

 Put Data files into the following directories:
 \AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\mods\[1.6.1]bspkrsCorev3.01.zip
 \AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\coremods\[1.6.1]TreeCapitator.Forge.1.6.1.r01.Uni.CoreMod.jar

 bspkrsCore shows up under mods. I go to cut a tree down with an Iron axe. I only get that block to drop. Any ideas on what I did wrong? 
和我有一样的问题.官方给的回答是:
To everyone using the latest 3 versions of forge. there is no longer a coremods folder. it has been merged with the mods folder. But merging the 2 still has issues. So if you get a duplicate mod error on the newest version of forge after putting a mod in the mods folder that was previously supposed to be in the coremods folder it is a problem on forges end and you have to wait for a bug fix update

这家伙对官方的回答表示:
Ah, thanks much.

It's a shame too, I've been patiently awaiting treecap, and was overly excited to see it updated. Guess I need to put that patience back on... *cry*

我只能:"呵呵".

replies.author: shxq
replies.txt_content:
官方给install方法了：

Install:
- Forge Build 762 and below: Put the TreeCapitator CoreMod jar file in the coremods folder under .minecraft and put the bspkrsCore zip file in the mods folder.
- Forge Build 763 and above: Put the TreeCapitator CoreMod jar file in the mods folder under .minecraft along with the bspkrsCore zip file.

安装：
-Forge Build 762 及以下： 将TreeCapitator CoreMod jar 文件放在.minecraft 下的 coremods 文件夹和 bspkrsCore zip 文件放入 mods 文件夹。
-Forge Build 763 及以上： 将TreeCapitator CoreMod jar 文件放在.minecraft 和 bspkrsCore zip 文件下的 mods 文件夹
